name: Rock Werchter

config_properties.name: Rock Werchter
config_properties.description: Belgium's largest annual rock music festival, held in Werchter since 1974, featuring major international artists.

ai_profile:
**Rock Werchter 2026: A Vibrant Fusion of Genres and Talent**

Rock Werchter 2026 boasts an eclectic lineup of 29 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of genres that span from Indie Rock (6 acts) and Alternative Rock (5 acts) to Electronic, Pop, and Soul. With its strong focus on indie and alternative sounds, the festival also embraces a variety of unique styles such as Dream Pop, Jazz Rap, and Psychedelic Rock, offering something for every music enthusiast. The inclusion of two DJs adds an energetic pulse to the mix, ensuring a dynamic festival atmosphere.

This year’s lineup highlights a strong international presence, with artists hailing from six countries. The USA leads the charge with 12 acts, followed closely by the UK’s 11, while Belgium, Canada, Germany, and Australia each contribute to the global flavor. While the majority of artists are male (22), the festival makes strides toward inclusivity, featuring three female acts, two mixed-gender groups, and one non-binary artist. However, representation of people of color remains low, with only two confirmed acts.

With an impressive average artist rating of 7.62, Rock Werchter 2026 promises a high-caliber experience. Nearly 60% of the acts have received ratings of 8 or higher, reflecting their critical acclaim and popularity. By blending established names with emerging talent across diverse genres and backgrounds, this edition of Rock Werchter continues its legacy as a premier destination for world-class music and cultural celebration.
